The photo was published on Twitter on De: 2020, alongside an image from the anime series Attack on Titan, with a caption comparing alleged child soldiers in the Philippines to characters from the anime.
The claim refers to the New People: s Army (NPA), the armed wing of the Communist Party of the Philippines, which has been engaged in an insurgency for decades.
The photo was shared on multiple social: 4. A reverse image search on TinEye and keyword searches on Google revealed that the photo was originally published in a January 31, 2000 report by Reuters about child soldiers in Myanmar. The Reuters photo features a 12-year-old soldier in the Karen rebel army, posing with his rifle in a jungle camp on the border with Thailand.
